title: Ancient African bedrock reveals violent beginnings of life on our blue planet
description: Ancient rocks in South Africa and Eswatini act like a geological time machine, revealing oceans, volcanoes and microbial life thriving more than 3.5 billion years ago.
content: You have probably seen the images of the surface of Mars, beamed back by NASA’s rovers. What if there were a time machine capable of roaming Earth during its remote geological past, perhaps even goin… [+4588 chars]
de: Uraltes afrikanisches Grundgestein enthüllt gewalttätige Anfänge des Lebens auf unserem blauen Planeten. Uralte Gesteine ​​in Südafrika und Eswatini wirken wie eine geologische Zeitmaschine und offenbaren Ozeane, Vulkane und mikrobielles Leben, das vor mehr als 3,5 Milliarden Jahren gedieh.
en: Ancient African bedrock reveals violent beginnings of life on our blue planet. Ancient rocks in South Africa and Eswatini act like a geological time machine, revealing oceans, volcanoes and microbial life thriving more than 3.5 billion years ago.
la: Vetus Afer petram violenta initia vitae nostrae in planeta caeruleo revelat. Saxa antiqua in Africa Australi et Eswatini tamquam machina temporis geologica agunt, revelans maria, vulcanorum et microbialium vitam plus quam 3.5 miliardis annos vigens.

title: What’s inside Mexico’s Popocatépetl? Scientists obtain first 3D images of the whole volcano
description: Scientists now know where the magma accumulates.
content:
By MARÍA VERZA
POPOCATÉPETL VOLCANO, Mexico (AP) In the predawn darkness, a team of scientists climbs the slope of Mexicos Popocatépetl volcano, one of the worlds most active and whose eruption coul… [+8245 chars]

en: What’s inside Mexico’s Popocatépetl? Scientists obtain first 3D images of the whole volcano. Scientists now know where the magma accumulates.
la: Quid intus est Popocatépetl Mexicum? Physici primum obtinent 3D imagines totius vulcani. Scientes nunc sciunt ubi magma accumulat.

title: After 7 lakh years of silence, Iran’s ‘sleeping giant’ volcano suddenly starts moving - scientists on alert
description: Iran's dormant Taftan volcano is showing signs of activity, with satellite data revealing ground uplift at its summit. This rise, occurring over ten months, suggests pressure building in a hydrothermal zone above magma, prompting calls for continued monitorin…
content:
• News
  • lifestyle
  • trending
  • After 7 lakh years of silence, Irans sleeping giant volcano suddenly starts moving - scientists on alert
Follow Us On Social M… [+1719 chars]
de: Nach 7.000 Jahren Stille beginnt sich Irans „schlafender Riese“-Vulkan plötzlich zu bewegen – Wissenschaftler in Alarmbereitschaft. Der ruhende Taftan-Vulkan im Iran zeigt Anzeichen von Aktivität. Satellitendaten zeigen eine Bodenhebung auf seinem Gipfel. Dieser über einen Zeitraum von zehn Monaten auftretende Anstieg lässt darauf schließen, dass sich in einer hydrothermischen Zone über Magma ein Druck aufbaut, was zu Forderungen nach einer kontinuierlichen Überwachung führt.
en: After 7 lakh years of silence, Iran’s ‘sleeping giant’ volcano suddenly starts moving - scientists on alert. Iran's dormant Taftan volcano is showing signs of activity, with satellite data revealing ground uplift at its summit. This rise, occurring over ten months, suggests pressure building in a hydrothermal zone above magma, prompting calls for continued monitorin…
la: Post VII annos silentii lakh, Iran's 'dormiens gigas' volcano subito incipit movere-disciplinae in intenti'. Irania sopitam Taftan vulcano signa actionis demonstrat, cum notitia satellite indicat terram extollere in cacumine suo. Hic ortus, super decem menses occurrens, impressionem in zona hydrothermali supra magma aedificandam suggerit, monens monitorin continuam vocat.

title: A visit to the land the colonists forgot: ‘We are glad you came, but we don’t need you’

Es ist ein unvergessliches Erlebnis

title: Hawaii: Kilauea Volcano Erupts, Unleashes Lava Fountains For 40th Time Since 2024
description: The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) has confirmed that the Kīlauea volcano in Hawaii entered its 40th eruptive episode since 2024.
content:
The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) has confirmed that the Kīlauea volcano in Hawaii entered its 40th eruptive episode since 2024.

de: Hawaii: Der Kilauea-Vulkan bricht aus und löst zum 40. Mal seit 2024 Lavafontänen aus. Der U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) hat bestätigt, dass der Kilauea-Vulkan auf Hawaii in die 40. Eruptionsepisode seit 2024 eingetreten ist.
en: Hawaii: Kilauea Volcano Erupts, Unleashes Lava Fountains For 40th Time Since 2024. The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) has confirmed that the Kīlauea volcano in Hawaii entered its 40th eruptive episode since 2024.
la: Hawaii: Kilauea Volcano Erupts, Lava Fontes Erumpit, 40th Tempus Ab anno 2024. Americae Geologicae Survey (USGS) confirmavit Kīlauea Volcano in Hawaii 40 suum eventum eruptivum cum 2024 ingressus.
